entry.title: Directing different ports to different containers with Traefik
entry.summary: This post is mostly for myself: I find the Traefik documentation hard to navigate, so having figured this out in response to a question on Stack Overflow, I’m putting it here to help it stick in my head. The question asks essentially how to perform port-based routing of requests to containers, so that a request for http://example.com goes to one container while a request for http://example.com:9090 goes to a different container.
